verbs.description: DALLAS - [ARG0: President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence] [ARGM-ADV: both] [V: addressed] [ARG1: the National Rifle Association Annual Meetings and Exhibits] [ARGM-TMP: today] , [ARGM-TMP: the first time a president and vice president have appeared jointly] . " [C-ARG1: We love] Texas ! " Trump said after chants of USA ! USA ! died down .

DALLAS - President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence both addressed the National Rifle Association Annual Meetings and Exhibits today , the first time a president and vice president [V: have] appeared jointly . " We love Texas ! " Trump said after chants of USA ! USA ! died down .

" We love Texas ! " Trump said after chants of USA ! USA ! died down .
